David Saff wrote:
> 
> There is no question that Eclipse under Linux suffers at least a 50% 
> performance hit on start-up--I've measured on a dual-booting 
> machine--plus more noticeable UI lag, although that appears to have been 
> alleviated in 3.2 to some extent.  Currently, on my 1GB, 2.4GHz P4, my 
> RCP app costs about 20 secs before any tests run.
> 

Mark Levison wrote:

 >
 > My machine is 1yr old: P4 3.6Ghz with 3 GB of RAM. OS Windows XP SP2.
 >

Thanks both of you. I'll have a play with windows on a second partition 
following your observation David. Seems like a cheaper alternative than 
a new machine :) Anyway, since this is going way off-topic, I'll stop here.

--
